result.eng: Two of the best teachers in Scotland.
result.ga: Beirt de na múinteoirí is fearr in Albain
result.orig: Beirt de na múinteoirí is fearr in Albain
result.html: Beirt de na múinteoirí is fearr in AlbainTwo of the best teachers in Scotland.
result.ponchtml: Beirt de na múinteoirí is fearr in AlbainTwo of the best teachers in Scotland.

result.eng: She has two children.
result.ga: Tá beirt pháistí aici
result.orig: Tá beirt pháistí aici
result.html: Tá beirt pháistí aiciShe has two children.
result.ponchtml: Tá beirt ṗáistí aiciShe has two children.

result.eng: Two men twenty years of age were taken to prison.
result.ga: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosún
result.orig: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosún
result.html: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosúnTwo men twenty years of age were taken to prison.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ beirt ḟear fiċe bliain d'aois i bpríosúnTwo men twenty years of age were taken to prison.

result.eng: We can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.
result.ga: Is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí ann
result.orig: Is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí ann
result.html: Is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí annWe can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.
result.ponchtml: Is léir ó na rianta a d'ḟág siad ina ndiaiḋ gur beirt a ḃí annWe can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.

result.eng: Two men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ga: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.orig: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.html: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimheTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ponchtml: Leag beirt ḟear go talaṁ í agus ġoid siad a mála láiṁeTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.

result.eng: I have two sons.
result.ga: Tá beirt mhac agam
result.orig: Tá beirt mhac agam
result.html: Tá beirt mhac agamI have two sons.
result.ponchtml: Tá beirt ṁac agamI have two sons.

result.eng: We have two sons and a daughter.
result.ga: Tá beirt mhac agus iníon againn
result.orig: Tá beirt mhac agus iníon againn
result.html: Tá beirt mhac agus iníon againnWe have two sons and a daughter.
result.ponchtml: Tá beirt ṁac agus iníon againnWe have two sons and a daughter.

result.eng: The two of them are at school.
result.ga: Tá an bheirt acu ar scoil
result.orig: Tá an bheirt acu ar scoil
result.html: Tá an bheirt acu ar scoilThe two of them are at school.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ḃeirt acu ar scoilThe two of them are at school.

result.eng: We have two children.
result.ga: Tá beirt chlainne againn
result.orig: Tá beirt chlainne againn
result.html: Tá beirt chlainne againnWe have two children.
result.ponchtml: Tá beirt ċlainne againnWe have two children.

result.eng: I have two [children] here, Mícheál who is in the corner there and here is my daughter Siubhán.
result.ga: Tá beirt agamsa anseo Mícheál atá sa gcúinne ansin agus seo í m'iníon Siubhán
result.orig: Tá beirt agamsa anseo Mícheál atá sa gcúinne ansin agus seo í m'iníon Siubhán
result.html: Tá beirt agamsa anseo Mícheál atá sa gcúinne ansin agus seo í m'iníon SiubhánI have two [children] here, Mícheál who is in the corner there and here is my daughter Siubhán.
result.ponchtml: Tá beirt agamsa anseo Míċeál atá sa gcúinne ansin agus seo í m'iníon SiuḃánI have two [children] here, Mícheál who is in the corner there and here is my daughter Siubhán.

result.eng: I have two [children].
result.ga: Tá beirt agam
result.orig: Tá beirt agam
result.html: Tá beirt agamI have two [children].
result.ponchtml: Tá beirt agamI have two [children].

result.eng: I have two brothers and one sister.
result.ga: Tá beirt dheartháir agus deirfiúr amháin agam
result.orig: Tá beirt dheartháir agus deirfiúr amháin agam
result.html: Tá beirt dheartháir agus deirfiúr amháin agamI have two brothers and one sister.
result.ponchtml: Tá beirt ḋearṫáir agus deirfiúr aṁáin agamI have two brothers and one sister.

result.eng: My wife and our two children.
result.ga: Mo bhean agus ár mbeirt ghasúr
result.orig: Mo bhean agus ár mbeirt ghasúr
result.html: Mo bhean agus ár mbeirt ghasúrMy wife and our two children.
result.ponchtml: Mo ḃean agus ár mbeirt ġasúrMy wife and our two children.

result.eng: Three are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
result.ga: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas
result.orig: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas

result.eng: We have two children.
result.ga: Tá beirt pháistí againn
result.orig: Tá beirt pháistí againn
result.html: Tá beirt pháistí againnWe have two children.
result.ponchtml: Tá beirt ṗáistí againnWe have two children.

result.eng: I have two sons.
result.ga: Tá beirt mhac agam
result.orig: Tá beirt mhac agam
result.html: Tá beirt mhac agamI have two sons.
result.ponchtml: Tá beirt ṁac agamI have two sons.

result.eng: Do you have children? Yes, I have two, a son and a daughter.
result.ga: An bhfuil páistí agat - Tá tá beirt agam mac agus iníon
result.orig: An bhfuil páistí agat - Tá tá beirt agam mac agus iníon
result.html: An bhfuil páistí agat - Tá tá beirt agam mac agus iníonDo you have children? Yes, I have two, a son and a daughter.
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil páistí agat - Tá tá beirt agam mac agus iníonDo you have children? Yes, I have two, a son and a daughter.

result.eng: I have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.
result.ga: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sine
result.orig: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sine
result.html: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sineI have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.
result.ponchtml: Tá ceaṫrar dearṫáir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sineI have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.

result.eng: I'm sharing an apartment with two others.
result.ga: Tá mé ag roinnt árasáin le beirt eile
result.orig: Tá mé ag roinnt árasáin le beirt eile
result.html: Tá mé ag roinnt árasáin le beirt eileI'm sharing an apartment with two others.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag roinnt árasáin le beirt eileI'm sharing an apartment with two others.

result.eng: Two people were killed and three others were injured.
result.ga: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eile
result.orig: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eile
result.html: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eileTwo people were killed and three others were injured.
result.ponchtml: Maraíoḋ beirt agus goineaḋ triúr eileTwo people were killed and three others were injured.

result.eng: She left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.
result.ga: D'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn
result.orig: D'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn
result.html: D'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinnShe left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág sí beirt iníonaċa óga ina diaiḋ nuair a ṫáinig sí go hÉirinnShe left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.

result.eng: They would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ga: Is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.orig: Is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.html: Is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ponchtml: Is minic a ẛuíoḋ siad ina mbeirt ar ḃruaċ na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.

result.eng: In the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ga: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.orig: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.html: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ponchtml: Sa ġeiṁreaḋ ba ġnáċ leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a ḋéanaṁ sna sruṫáinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
